item.description:
Beginner bellydance classes with Danita will resume on Wednesday, June 9, 2010 from 6:30 - 7:30 p.m. (Note: Thursday night classes are no longer available).

This class is for anyone who is interested in learning basic bellydance movement (body isolations) or anyone who has experience and wants to strengthen their movement. This class is good for toning muscles throughout the body and is not a high impact class. Wear something comfortable clothing and be prepared to have some lighthearted fun! This is an ongoing class and does not teach choreography.

The fee is $60 for the first six sessions.

COMING SOON: Level II - Tribal Fusion Choreography Classes

Important: If you have any physical limitations, please check with your Physician before attending these classes.
item.name: Beginner Bellydance with Danita on Wednesdays
